title: Stylish Novotel Sydney Escape near Airport with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
description:
Savour a generous slice of urban sophistication and convenience from this Novotel property, perfectly positioned for seamless city exploration and easy airport accessibility. Soak up the views of the Cahill Parklands and the Kogarah Golf Course as you recharge yourself in the hotel's plush rooms or relax by the outdoor swimming pool.

Just a short drive away, Sydney's vibrant CBD and its famed landmarks, including the Opera House, Harbour Bridge and the glittering Bondi Beach await exploration. After a day of adventure in the city, return to your hotel to relish modern Australian-style dining featuring local produce at the botanical-themed, The Marke Kitchen & Bar and indulge in specially-crafted cocktails at The Marke Bar.
offer_address: 22 Levey Street, Wolli Creek, New South Wales 2205, Australia
